about_the_game:
Do you want to be a elegant Elf?
Pick up a Twilight Guardian Pack that exclusively made for Elf Hunter. This pack includes costumes, dyes, experience booster and assistant item for reinforcing.
The package will be delivered to the mail box of the first character you log into after you make your purchase.

Pack Contents

x 1 Twilight Elf Hunter Avatar set
*Avatar set for each class can be received from NPC, Alonzo.
x 2 Premium Avatar Dye [Top-class]
x 1 Premium Weapon Dye [Top-class]
x 2 Book of Experience Booster (180 minutes)
x 3 Blessed Hammer (Armor)
x 1 Blessed Hammer (Weapon)

* All items are bounded in an account except Twilight Elf Hunter Avatar Set
* Twilight Elf Hunter Avatar Set will be tradable

name: Twilight Guardian Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP Service Pack 3
  • Processor: Intel Premium 4 2.42 GHz / AMD XP 2600+
  • Memory: 1 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce FX 5700 / ATI Radeon 9600 PRO (128MB)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
